about_the_game:
Survive the apocalypse with The Walking Dead Pack.

Contains:

- Rick Grimes playable character
- Rick Grimes "Leader" variant outfit
- Michonne playable character
- Michonne "Traveler" variant outfit.
detailed_description:
Survive the apocalypse with The Walking Dead Pack.

Contains:

- Rick Grimes playable character
- Rick Grimes "Leader" variant outfit
- Michonne playable character
- Michonne "Traveler" variant outfit.

package_groups.title: Buy Funko Fusion - The Walking Dead Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Survive the apocalypse with The Walking Dead Pack. Play as Rick Grimes or Michonne from The Walking Dead comic books. Includes variant outfits for Rick Grimes as Alexandria's leader, and Michonne in her Traveler outfit.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
